app.title: Juumu

checkout.further_orders_free: Your remaining orders for the day with {} will be shipped for FREE!!!
checkout.group_buy_msg: Thanks for the group buy. Atleast 1 member needs to buy with you in a day to get this discounted price.
checkout.group_buy_msg_generic: Invite more members to join your group to bring down the price of the product.
checkout.group_order_success: Thanks for your order. Your order will be processed when your friends join you in the group buy. Invite friends to get the group buy pricing

condition.title: Conditions:
condition.term1: • Your payment will be processed immediately.
condition.term2: • Your payment will be refunded in full if not enough members join your group.
condition.term3: If more members join your group and the price of the product goes down, you will be charged the lowest price based on the number of members in the group and the remaining amount you paid will be refunded.

favorites.title: Favourites
favorites.no_data: You haven't tagged any {} as favourites yet.

points_information.info1: Earn points by sharing the app or the products. {}You will earn points if one joins Juumu using your shared link. {}On sharing the products with your friends & family, you will earn points if any purchase happens through your shared link.
points_information.info2: Redeem your points on your purchase.
points_information.info4: How do i use my points/earnings?
points_information.info5: You can use your points either during the checkout or REDEEM to actual cash which would be transferred to your bank account.
points_information.info_10: How many points do I earn by marketing a product?
points_information.info_11: The exact points depends on how many products get sold. You would get a percentage of sale as a commission. The commission percentage depends on number of items sold.
points_information.info_12: How many days do i have to market the product?
points_information.info_13: You have 7 days to market the product. You would get a commission on all sales that happens on those 7 days.
points_information.info_14: Is there a minimum amount to Redeem cash?
points_information.info_15: Yes, the minimum amount to cash is {}
points_information.new_user_reward_info_line2: You have got 10% OFF as a welcome bonus.{}Check it out now.
points_information.register_user_reward_info_line2: A special treat for new members!
points_information.register_user_reward_info_line3: Register now to get a mystery coupon as a welcome bonus.
points_information.box_3_sub_title: Get the reward when they sign up

product.step1: 1. Your brand/seller should enter the above code in their Profile -> Influencer section. They need to enter this code and the marketting commission.
product.step2: 2. Your brand/seller should add the above code in the basic information section while creating a new product for you to start selling the products.
product.step3: Brands should click 'Share' link in their supplier page to share a product with you to market during live show.
